amendment.description: Amendment to require a National Academy of Sciences study on the role of community colleges in cybersecurity education. The study would also identify best practices related to cybersecurity education between community colleges and four-year educational institutions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 111-410 to require a National Academy of Sciences study on the role of community colleges in cybersecurity education. The study would also identify best practices related to cybersecurity education between community colleges and four-year educational institutions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bright amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Bright.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bright amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
